0.text: Innate: Periodically, Vi's next ability hit grants her a  shield equal to 13% of her maximum health for 3 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Vi's next ability hit grants her a shield equal to 13% of her maximum health for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: Blast Shield's  cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds each time  Denting Blows is consumed.
1.html: Blast Shield's  cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds each time Denting Blows is consumed.
markedPassages: cooldown
Denting Blows

0.text: Active: Vi  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
0.html: Active: Vi charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range

1.text: Vault Breaker can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is cancelled and put on  full cooldown. If the charge is  interrupted, it will be put on a 3-second cooldown.
1.html: Vault Breaker can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is cancelled and put on  full cooldown. If the charge is interrupted, it will be put on a 3-second cooldown.
markedPassages: full
interrupted

2.text: Recast: Vi  dashes in the target direction to deal physical damage to enemies within her path, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time), and  pull all non-champions hit towards her.
2.html: Recast: Vi dashes in the target direction to deal physical damage to enemies within her path, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time), and pull all non-champions hit towards her.
markedPassages: dashes
pull

3.text: She stops upon hitting an enemy  champion,  knocking them back over 0.75 seconds.
3.html: She stops upon hitting an enemy champion, knocking them back over 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
knocking them back

4.text: Relentless Force and  Cease and Desist can be cast during the dash.
4.html: Relentless Force and Cease and Desist can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Relentless Force
Cease and Desist
possibleConcerningAbilities: Relentless Force and  Cease and Desist can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Passive: Vi's basic attacks  on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to enemies hit for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against non-champions, and inflict  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
0.html: Passive: Vi's basic attacks on-hit and Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to enemies hit for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against non-champions, and inflict  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

0.content: 4 / 5.5 / 7 / 8.5 / 10% (+「 1% per 35 」bonus AD) of target's maximum health

1.text: After consuming Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent triggers.
1.html: After consuming Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent triggers.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Vi empowers her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range and trigger a blast in the target's direction that deals modified physical damage to enemies hit in a cone. Relentless Force can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.
0.html: Active: Vi empowers her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range and trigger a blast in the target's direction that deals modified physical damage to enemies hit in a cone. Relentless Force can critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
50 bonus range
critically strike
(75% +  35%) AD
35%

1.text: Vi periodically stocks a Relentless Force charge, up to a maximum of 2.
1.html: Vi periodically stocks a Relentless Force charge, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: Relentless Force  resets Vi's basic attack timer.
2.html: Relentless Force resets Vi's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Relentless Force  resets Vi's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Vi singles out the target enemy  champion and  dashes with  displacement immunity towards them, during which they are  revealed. Upon approaching within 300-units, she  dashes through and grabs them,  knocking them up for 1.3 seconds and dealing physical damage after 0.75 seconds.
0.html: Active: Vi singles out the target enemy champion and dashes with displacement immunity towards them, during which they are revealed. Upon approaching within 300-units, she dashes through and grabs them, knocking them up for 1.3 seconds and dealing physical damage after 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
dashes
displacement immunity
revealed
dashes
knocking them up

1.text: Enemies she dashes through are dealt the same damage,  knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and  stunned for 0.75 seconds.
1.html: Enemies she dashes through are dealt the same damage, knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and stunned for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: knocked aside
stunned
